remarks.format:
## Remarks The following table describes what the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FlowDocumentScrollViewerAutomationPeer.GetPattern%2A> method returns when depending on the value of `patternInterface`:
|The value of `patternInterface`|The return value| |-------------------------------------|----------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|A reference to the current instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer> for this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TextBoxAutomationPeer>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|An object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider> interface.| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface>|An object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.|
